import React from 'react' import header from "../components/Images/white-window2.png"; import tiffany from "../components/Images/rndImgNobg.png"; import Row from "../components/Row"; import Card from "../components/Card"; import { FaPhone, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaGithub, FaRegEnvelope, FaLinkedinIn, FaDownload } from "react-icons/fa"; import date from "../components/Images/date.png"; import road from "../components/Images/cycling.png"; import photos from "../components/Images/photos.png"; import ScrollToTop from "../components/ScrollToTop"; import "./Home.css"; const Home = () => { return (

My Portfolio

About Me

Hello, world! I'm Tiffany . . .

A newly trained MERN full stack developer who enjoys the challenge of working with a team to build functional, thoughtful and engaging web applications.

I came to the profession after many years of using website tool builders to design landing pages and basic sites for friends and personal use. When the time was right for a career change, I chose a Full Stack Development program as my foundation for learning to code. That journey solidified my passion for front end web development. I am excited about opportunities to practice my new skills and continue to gain new ones.

My ideal work environment is team-oriented and one that allows everyone's talents to flourish. I find that I work best in an environment that is empowering and positive.

When I am not coding, I enjoy road biking and hiking.

(520) 257-0530
Tucson, AZ

Highlighted Projects

Through bootcamp training, I have completed projects and assignments covering HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, progressive web apps, agile methodology, database theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, as well as utilizing frameworks such as Bootstrap, W3CSS to build user interfaces.

Link to each of my group projects below. For each of these, my responsibility inlcuded wireframe, UI and front end development. I developed the concepts for RoadRoutes and PhotoScribe.
